Package de.rwth.oosc

Class DrawApplicationModel

java.lang.Object
org.jhotdraw.beans.AbstractBean
org.jhotdraw.app.AbstractApplicationModel
org.jhotdraw.app.DefaultApplicationModel
de.rwth.oosc.DrawApplicationModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, org.jhotdraw.app.ApplicationModel
public class DrawApplicationModel extends org.jhotdraw.app.DefaultApplicationModel
Provides factory methods for creating views, menu bars and toolbars.

See ApplicationModel on how this class interacts with an application.

Version:
$Id: DrawApplicationModel.java 788 2014-03-22 07:56:28Z rawcoder $
Author:
Werner Randelshofer.
